segments.text: What can I do for you , Madam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you help me with Comprehensive Credit Granting ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , Madam . What would you like to know ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . We can grant a Financing Promise Quota , if you qualify . This means that we can deal with all of your needs in a speedy and efficient way . Firstly , your Credit Rating must be class A , and your Debt to Asset Ratio must be top notch , for the industry you are involved in .
segments.speaker: S1
